name: SNACCMAN
description:
Snaccman is a very simple Pacman clone created in Unity. THE GAME: THE OBJECTIVE:

Snaccman's objective is to collect all the food items to unlock the door in the center. Beware of the spooky ghosts ! 👻

THE WHY:

My group partner and I love the "classic" arcade video games and we thought it would be fun to create a Pacman type game.

COMPATIBILITY:

Snaccman's build compatibility is currently Mac only.
